subpanels.description: Panel A depicts the dorsal habitus of an ovigerous female Nephropsis neglecta Holthuis, 1974. The total length of the specimen is 84 mm. The specimen was collected from Bpot-Talude MT 71 - 2, MOUFPE 15.
Panel B shows the dorsal view of the carapace of Nephropsis neglecta Holthuis, 1974.
Panel C displays the right lateral view of the abdomen of Nephropsis neglecta Holthuis, 1974.
